Ich stimme zu, dass meine Antwort zur Au: I agree that my answer may be shared with OpenAI and stored anonymously for evaluation purposes. I will make sure not to provide any personal, copyright protected or sensitive data such as passwords. The generated questions and feedback as well as my answers will be stored completely anonymously in Stud.IP in order to assess the usability of this function and the quality of the generated questions and feedback. Always check the correctness of the generated texts, as they may contain hallucinations generated by the AI.
Sie können wählen, ob Sie den zentral hi: You can use either the global OpenAI API key of your location or your own key.
Geben Sie Ihren eigenen API-Key an. Eine: Provide your own API key. An API key can be created in the account settings of the OpenAI website. To see these settings, you must log in to your OpenAI account or sign up.
Sie können zu Ihrem API-Key das zu verwe: You can specify the OpenAI chat model to be used with your API key. The model must be compatible with the Chat Completions API from OpenAI. If you do not specify a model, the model configured globally in Stud.IP will be used.
Sie können zwischen zwei Verfahren zur G: You can choose between two question generation methods. The "Question pool" method generates a question catalogue when the block is saved. The questions will be displayed sequentially. The "Random" option always generates new questions using the GPT model.
Geben Sie an, wie viele Fragen generiert: Specify how many questions should be generated if the block is newly created or if no questions are available in the pool.
Hiermit geben Sie an, in welcher Sprache: Here you specify in which language the questions and feedback should be generated.
Mit der Erstellung dieses Blockes bestät: I confirm with the creation of this block that the course content of the current page does not contain any sensitive personal or copyright protected data and therefore may be submitted to OpenAI. The generated questions and sample solutions will be saved along with the provided settings in Stud.IP in order to assess the usability of this block and the quality of the generated questions and feedback. These settings contain the question generation mode, the number of initial questions, the lecture content, the additional instructions, the language and the difficulty.
Es sind keine Fragen vorhanden. Wenn Sie: No questions are available. When you save the block, initial questions will be created.
Möchten Sie die Frage wirklich löschen?: Are you sure you want to delete the question?
The block is currently being saved.
Sie müssen den Block zuerst abspeichern,: You have to save the block first to be able to see the generated questions here. In addition, the "Question Pool" option must be selected in the settings as the question generation method.
Im Pool sind keine Fragen vorhanden: No questions are available in the pool
Bitte stellen Sie Ihren OpenAI-API-Key b: Please provide your OpenAI API key.
Bitte stellen Sie im Eingabefeld den Inh: Please provide the content of the lecture for which the questions should be generated in the input field.
Hier können Sie dem Model zusätzliche In: Here you can give the model additional information, such as a focus on a specific part of the learning content or an instruction.
Wenn Sie das Verfahren zur Generierung d: If you change the question generation mode, the existing questions and answers will be deleted. Would you like to continue?
